text: (viśvāsavantayini! obaṭa bhāryayāvan kihipa deneku siṭiyahot) oba (obagē) bhāryayāvan atarē (sampūrṇa vaśayenma) sādhāraṇa lesa kaṭayutu kaḷa yutuya yayi (kopamaṇa duraṭa) kæmati vuvada, (eya) obaṭa prāyōgika vannē næta. namut (ekama bhāyya_yāva desaṭa) oba sampūrṇayenma sēndu vī an ayava (ataramaṁ kara), ē mē ata pæddennan bavaṭa pat nokaranu! oba (allāhṭa) biya vī (oba atarē) sādhāraṇava hæsiruṇahot niyata vaśayenma allāh (obagē væradi valaṭa) samāva dī dayāva pahaḷa karanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
